00022 #define kASCII "ascii"

00024 EAN13::EAN13( string *data )
00025 {
00026         filename = "EANUPC.xml";
00027         parityFilename = "ParityEAN13.xml";
00028         parsed_xml.parse< 0 >( getXMLToParse( &filename ) );
00029         parity_xml.parse< 0 >( getXMLToParse( &parityFilename ) );
00030         setDataLength( 12 ); //variable length symbol
00031         
00032         //verify
00033         if ( verifyData( data ) ) 
00034         {
00035                 xml_node< > *gpnode = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->next_sibling( "non_data_encoding" );
00036                 xml_node< > *rightnode = gpnode->first_node( "guard_right" )->first_node( "EANUPC" );
00037                 string right =  rightnode->value( );
00038                 xml_node< > *centrenode = gpnode->first_node( "guard_centre" )->first_node( "EANUPC" );
00039                 string centre =  centrenode->value( );
00040                 xml_node< > *leftnode = gpnode->first_node( "guard_left" )->first_node( "EANUPC" );
00041                 string left =  leftnode->value( );
00042                 setGuardPatterns( left , centre, right );
00043                 //check char
00044                 encodeCheckCharacter( data );
00045                 //quiet zones
00046                 encodeQuietZones( );
00047         }
00048         else 
00049         {
00050                 cerr << "Data verification failed" << endl;
00051         }
00052 }

00061 void EAN13::encodeSymbol ( const string *data )
00062 {
00063         string parityRef = data->substr( 0,1 );
00064         string leftSide = data->substr( 1,6 );
00065         string rightSide = data->substr( 7,6 );
00066         
00067         string searchRef = "parity";
00068         searchRef = searchRef.append( parityRef );
00069         xml_node< > *parityNode = parity_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->first_node( searchRef.c_str( ) );
00070         xml_node< > *node = NULL;
00071         string parityPattern = parityNode->value( );
00072 
00073         //loop through the left side
00074         for ( int zz = 0; zz < leftSide.length( ); zz++ ) 
00075         {
00076                 char aChar = leftSide.at( zz );
00077                 string firstBit = kASCII;
00078                 string secondBit;
00079                 stringstream out;
00080                 out << ( int )aChar;
00081                 secondBit = out.str( );
00082                 out.flush( );
00083                 firstBit.append( secondBit );
00084                 
00085                 node = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( parityPattern.substr( zz,1 ).c_str( ) );
00086                 
00087                 vector< int > *pattern = stringToVector( node->value( ) );
00088                 Symbol *eSymbol = createSymbol( 0, 0, 0, 0, pattern );
00089                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( eSymbol );
00090         }
00091         //loop through the right side data
00092         for ( int aa = 0; aa < rightSide.length( ); aa++ ) 
00093         {
00094                 char bChar = rightSide.at( aa );
00095                 string firstBit = kASCII;
00096                 string secondBit;
00097                 stringstream out;
00098                 out << ( int )bChar;
00099                 secondBit = out.str( );
00100                 out.flush( );
00101                 firstBit.append( secondBit );
00102                 
00103                 node = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->first_node( firstBit.c_str( ) )->first_node( "C" );
00104                 vector< int > *pattern = stringToVector( node->value( ) );
00105                 Symbol *eSymbol = createSymbol( 0, 0, 1, 0, pattern );
00106                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( eSymbol );
00107         }
00108         
00109         EAN13::encodeGuardPatterns( );
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 void EAN13::encodeQuietZones ( )
00114 {
00115         xml_node< > *QZ = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->next_sibling( )->first_node( "quietzone_left" )->first_node( "EAN13" );
00116         vector< int > *pattern = new vector< int >;
00117         
00118         int left = atoi( QZ->value( ) );
00119         pattern->push_back( left );
00120         Symbol *lqzSymbol = createSymbol( 2, 0, 0, 0, pattern );
00121         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( lqzSymbol, 0 );
00122         
00123         QZ = parsed_xml.first_node( )->first_node( )->next_sibling( )->next_sibling( )->first_node( "quietzone_right" )->first_node( "EAN13" );
00124         vector< int > *patternr = new vector< int >;
00125         int right = atoi( QZ->value( ) );
00126         patternr->push_back( right );
00127         Symbol *rqzSymbol = createSymbol( 2, 0, 0, 0, patternr );
00128         BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( rqzSymbol, EAN13::getEncodedSymbols( ).size( ) );
00129 }

00131 
00132 void EAN13::encodeGuardPatterns( )
00133 {
00134         for ( int ff = 0; ff < EAN13::getGuardPatterns( ).size( ); ff++) 
00135         {
00136                 vector< int > *pattern = stringToVector( EAN13::getGuardPatterns( ).at( ff ) );
00137                 int le, pos;
00138                 switch ( ff ) {
00139                         case 0:
00140                                 le = 1;
00141                                 pos = 0;
00142                                 break;
00143                         case 1:
00144                                 le = 0;
00145                                 pos = 7;
00146                                 break;
00147                         case 2:
00148                                 le = 1;
00149                                 pos = EAN13::getEncodedSymbols( ).size( );
00150                                 break;
00151                         default:
00152                                 break;
00153                 }
00154                 Symbol *gpSymbol = createSymbol( 3, 0, le, 0, pattern );
00155                 BaseBarcode::addEncodedSymbol( gpSymbol, pos );
00156         }
00157 }

00160 void EAN13::setGuardPatterns( string left, string centre, string right )
00161 {
00162         guardPatterns.push_back( left );
00163         guardPatterns.push_back( centre );
00164         guardPatterns.push_back( right );
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 vector< string > EAN13::getGuardPatterns( )
00169 {
00170         return guardPatterns;
00171 }

00173 
00174 vector< int >* EAN13::stringToVector( string aString )
00175 {
00176         vector< int > *pattern = new vector< int >;
00177         for ( int ll = 0; ll < aString.length( ) ; ll++ )
00178         {
00179                 char eachCharFromResult = aString.at( ll );
00180                 int temp = atoi( &eachCharFromResult );
00181                 pattern->push_back( temp );
00182         }
00183         return pattern;
00184 }
